Detailed Description

Class PatchLevelEnhancedFillPattern is an implementation of the abstract base class PatchLevelFillPattern.

This class is used by the RefineSchedule to restrict filling to only patches in ghost regions across an ehanced connectivity block boundary. It is intended for users who wish to handle the filling of data at these singularities separately from the filling of all other data.

See also:
xfer::RefineSchedule

Member Function Documentation

void SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelEnhancedFillPattern::computeFillBoxesAndNeighborhoodSets ( boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxLevel > &  fill_box_level,
boost::shared_ptr< hier::Connector > &  dst_to_fill,
const hier::BoxLevel &  dst_box_level,
const hier::IntVector &  fill_ghost_width,
bool  data_on_patch_border 
) [virtual]

Compute the boxes representing the region that will be filled by a RefineSchedule.

The fill boxes will exist only for destination patches that touch a block boundary at enhanced connectivity. The fill boxes will be the portion of the ghost regions of those patches lying across the enhanced connectivity boundary.

Parameters:
[out] fill_box_level Output BoxLevel to be filled
[out] dst_to_fill Output Connector between dst_box_level and fill_box_level
[in] dst_box_level destination level
[in] fill_ghost_width Ghost width being filled by refine schedule
[in] data_on_patch_border true if there is data living on patch borders
Precondition:
dst_box_level.getDim() == fill_ghost_width.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

void SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelEnhancedFillPattern::computeDestinationFillBoxesOnSourceProc ( FillSet &  dst_fill_boxes_on_src_proc,
const hier::BoxLevel &  dst_box_level,
const hier::Connector &  src_to_dst,
const hier::IntVector &  fill_ghost_width 
) [virtual]

Virtual method to compute the destination fill boxes.

Since needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes() returns true, this method should never be called. It is implemented here to satisfy the pure virtual interface from the base class. An error will result if this is ever called.

Precondition:
needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes()

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

References needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes(), NULL_USE, and TBOX_ERROR.

bool SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelEnhancedFillPattern::doesSourceLevelCommunicateToDestination (  )  const [virtual]

Tell RefineSchedule not to communicate data directly from source to destination level.

With this fill pattern, the RefineSchedule does not attempt to fill as much of the destination level as possible from the source level at the same level of resolution. By returning 'false', this method tells the RefineSchedule to skip that step.

Returns:
false

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

int SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelEnhancedFillPattern::getMaxFillBoxes (  )  const [virtual]

Return the maximum number of fill boxes.

This will not return a valid value until computeFillBoxesAndNeighborhoodSets is fully implemented. An error will occur if this method is called

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.
